schedule.focus: Jerk technique + leg drive — BTN Power Jerks, Clean & Push Press
key_exercises: Clean & Push Press (ramp to power jerk)
Jerk Recovery or Bottoms up Squat
schedule.notes: Added T2 hybrid. Covers uncovered jerk/leg drive work from Mon+Wed program days.

schedule.focus: Yoyo Snatch, Snatch DL + Hang Snatch/Balance from Wed
schedule.notes: Snatch technique day. No straps on snatches. Back-to-back with Mon T2 but different muscle emphasis (snatch vs jerk).

schedule.focus: Front Squat 5x5, Rack Hold + C&J+Jerk from Mon
carry_over: Front Squat (missed last week's S session)
schedule.notes: Fills last week's squat gap. C&J+Jerk pulled from Mon program — priority olympic lift.

schedule.focus: Heavy singles — Power Snatch + Power Clean & Push Press
schedule.notes: Back-to-back with S but low volume. Push for proper heavy day — no true H last week.

protection_rule: If legs are heavy after Thu S, switch Fri H to mini-H (singles at 85%, skip side bends).
notes: Week 3 odd pattern. 4 WL days (Mon T2/Tue/Thu/Fri). Mon T2 added at check-in — jerk/leg drive work. Comp March 28 — no taper yet.
